# Emergency Supply Tracker

> A web application to help households track emergency preparedness supplies.

## Purpose

Helps users maintain adequate emergency supplies. Based on official emergency preparedness recommendations.

## Features

- Track emergency items across customizable categories
- Add custom items and categories
- Household configuration (adults, children, infants, pets)
- Expiration date tracking and alerts
- Import/export data for backup
- Multi-language support (English, Finnish)
- Offline-capable Progressive Web App (PWA)
- Privacy-focused: all data stored locally in browser

## Languages

- English
- Finnish (Suomi)

## Technical

- Single-page application (React)
- Works offline after first visit
- No account required
- No data sent to servers

## URL

https://www.emergencysupplytracker.com
